blogs.title: Welcome to Maheers Tech Blog
blogs.body: I am excited to apply for the Front End Developer position at Corriculo. With 7 years of experience in creating visually appealing and user-centric websites, I am confident in my ability to contribute to your team. In my current role at Nalot Multisystems limited, I lead the development and design of the company website, Office application  resulting in a significant increase in both user engagement and social media activities.
blogs.author: Maheer
